Tunable.name: BUFF_ALARM_TIME
Tunable.description: Integer value in sim minutes in which the buff alarm will trigger to send a telemetry report of current active buff's on the household sims.

Tunable.name: EMOTION_REL_ALARM_TIME
Tunable.description: Integer value in sim minutes in which the emotion and relationship alarm will trigger to send a telemetry report of the emotion and relationship status of the household sims.

TunableList.name: HOOK_ACTIONS
TunableList.description: List of hook actions that we want to drop or collect to create rules to disable them from triggering.

TunableEnum.name: action
TunableEnum.description: Action to take for the specified tags. COLLECT to enable the hook. DROP to disable the hook.

Tunable.name: group_tag
Tunable.description: Group identifier of the hook where the action should be applied. Can be empty if we want to apply an action by only module or hook tag. e.g. 'WHIM'

Tunable.name: hook_tag
Tunable.description: Tag identifier of the hook where the action should be applied. Can be empty if we want to apply an action by only module or group tag. e.g. 'WADD'

Tunable.name: module_tag
Tunable.description: Module identifier of the hook where the action should be applied. Can be empty if we want to apply an action by only group or hook tag. e.g. 'GAME'.

Tunable.name: priority
Tunable.description: Priority for this rule to apply. The rules are sorted in priority order (lowest priority first). The the first rule that matches a hook causes the hook to be blocked or collected, depending on the value of action. e.g. We can have an action to COLLECT hook {GAME, WHIM, WADD} with priority 0, and an action to DROP hooks with module 'GAME' {GAME, '', ''} with priority 1, this means the collected hook action will have more importance than the rule to drop all GAME hooks.
